Type Property# appShortcuts

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOSwatchOS 9.0+

```
@AppShortcutsBuilder
static var appShortcuts: [AppShortcut] { get }
```

**Required**

[`enum AppShortcutsBuilder`](/documentation/appintents/appshortcutsbuilder)A result builder that allows you to declaratively describe the App Shortcuts that your app provides.
